headline: Allegion Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: DUBLIN, December 04, 2025--Allegion plc (NYSE: ALLE), a leading global security products and solutions provider, announced that its board of directors declared a quarterly dividend of $0.51 per ordinary share of the company on Dec. 3, 2025.
